name: She forgets to DIE
description:
A young girl has just had a lethal fall in the secret cave of an old house...
Wait, no?! She is still alive but.. how? Well, it's just a question of time, the Death is coming to take her soul^^ Yes I'm a chill narrator, why?

In this soft horror game, you need to escape this cave! You start with no items but There is many commands and objects in the game, here is a list :

X : to throw a selected item in the direction you are looking at.

C : to attack with the selected item in the direction you are looking at.
V : Switch between the items in your inventory (max 3).

Y : Eat one of the items you are holding and heal you up.

SPACE: Open Door.

Directional arrows : move your character in each directions (hold two to move directional.

HINT 1: First find a weapon (carrot) before you can fight enemies!

HINT 2: Try to hit boxes! They may contains useful items.

HINT 3: at the start, enemies are dangerous, try to play safe or run to escape them!
